name: tm92
effect: Teaches Trick Room to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Trick Room to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.
